name: Material Possession
description:
Meet you, a lonely spirit trapped in your old house. In an effort to leave, you need to make your way through the house room by room until you find the exit. But there's a catch! Someone has moved some of your possessions around in every room! To escape, you'll need to move them back, and maybe cause a little mayhem for whoever took over your house.

Controls

Use your mouse to look around, and WASD to fly through the room.
R allows you to possess or unpossess an object
